name: Descend into the Deeper Web
description:
Descending into the DeeperWeb.

Game made for my Digital Language Arts class, taught by Sheila [S.A.] Chavarría [instagram: @devendraai]

A descent into the body of an interconnected web, a virtual space. A future where spiders navigate our bodies as we navigate the internet; or even a potential present.

Short game. Should not last more than 10 minutes to play through

Edit #1 -- Sequenced all versions of game (web, Mac and Windows/Linux) to one itch page. Corrected some typos.
